Translations.Text: zai na ri, dadi jiang baogao ta de xiaoxi.
Yinwei ni de zhu yi qishile ta
zai na ri, renmen jiang fenfen di lisan
yibian tamen de jian ziji xingwei de baoying.
Xing yige xiao mayi zhong de shanshi zhe, jiang jian qi shan bao; zuo yige xiao mayi zhong de e shi zhe, jiang jian qi e bao.
